about.title: About Me
about.description: Senior Full-Stack Engineer specializing in scalable distributed systems. Tech agnostic with expertise in building high-performance applications

projects.title: Project One
projects.description: A brief description of your project. This project demonstrates how to build a simple web application using React and TypeScript.

responsibilities: Built a **firmwide generic rules engine** for config-driven rule lifecycle management across business domains.
Implemented **Data Quality Engine**, **Recon Engine**, and **Angular-based Rules UI** with versioning and automated SDLC support.
Developed a **Spark-based impact analysis service** to validate rules across 85M+ securities.
Introduced a **RAG-based GenAI rules butler** for rule searching, test creation, and coverage checks using GPT-4 and ChromaDB.
Optimized Kafka for message prioritization, ensuring minimal delay for critical workflows.
Designed an **event-driven metadata store** serving 50+ teams using MongoDB, Airflow, and Kafka.
Enhanced data enrichment pipelines to process **100M+ records daily** and implemented blue-green deployments.

experience.company: Accolite Digital Pvt Ltd (Contract: Morgan Stanley)
responsibilities: Migrated legacy systems to Kafka, boosting processing throughput from 1.5K/s to 20K/s.
Redesigned exception workflows with **last-write-wins**, versioning, and Kafka partition optimization.
Introduced exception suppression/batching to reduce L2 support overhead.
Optimized bulk exception search API, improving response time by **300%**.
Developed a Django backend and React.js frontend for loan risk profiling.
Used NLP to extract and analyze client data from documents.
